meanings.definition: To restore a deleted file or data.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally deleted my essay, but I was able to undelete it.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to undelete any important documents before emptying the trash bin.
meanings.sent3: My friend joked that he could undelete the cookies he accidentally ate from the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her magic wand seemed to have the power to undelete any mistake she made.
meanings.sent5: With a few clicks, the software was able to undelete all the lost photos from the camera.

meanings.definition: The act of recovering a deleted item.
meanings.sent1: After the undelete, all my photos were back in the album.
meanings.sent2: The undelete process was quick and saved me from losing important files.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved an impressive undelete of a vanished rabbit.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, undelete plays a crucial role in data recovery.
meanings.sent5: The undelete function on the computer was a lifesaver when I accidentally deleted my presentation.
